TransformationHeaderLocale.Description: Default Template for Quote Proposal Print
TransformationHeaderLocale.Template: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output indent="yes" method="xml" /> <xsl:variable name="localeCode" select="/PrintJasper/Order/@LocaleCode" /> <xsl:variable name="proposalDate" select="/PrintJasper/Order/@Createts" /> <xsl:variable name="expirationDate" select="/PrintJasper/Order/@ExpirationDate" /> <xsl:variable name="reqDeliveryDate" select="/PrintJasper/Order/@ReqDeliveryDate" /> <xsl:variable name="linesubtotal" select="/PrintJasper/Order/OverallTotals/@LineSubTotal" /> <xsl:variable name="adjustmentTotal" select="/PrintJasper/Order/OverallTotals/@GrandDiscount" /> <xsl:variable name="shipping" select="/PrintJasper/Order/OverallTotals/@HdrShippingCharges" /> <xsl:variable name="taxes" select="/PrintJasper/Order/OverallTotals/@GrandTax" /> <xsl:variable name="totalAmount" select="/PrintJasper/Order/OverallTotals/@GrandTotal" /> <xsl:variable name="xslfontfamily"> <xsl:text>sans-serif</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="pricePrefix" select="/PrintJasper/Order/PriceInfo/@PrefixSymbol" /> <xsl:variable name="newline"> <xsl:text /> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <fo:root> <fo:layout-master-set> <fo:simple-page-master margin-bottom="2cm" margin-left="1.5cm" margin-right="1.5cm" margin-top="1cm" master-name="A4-portrait" page-height="29.7cm" page-width="21.0cm"> <fo:region-body /> <fo:region-after /> </fo:simple-page-master> </fo:layout-master-set> <fo:page-sequence master-reference="A4-portrait"> <!--Page Footer --> <fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-after" font-size="10pt"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" width="17cm"> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="17cm"> <fo:table-column column-width="65%" /> <fo:table-column column-width="35%" /> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell padding="2mm" text-align="left"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:text>Â© Copyright IBM Corp. [2010, 2011] All Rights Reserved</xsl:text> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell padding="2mm" text-align="right"> <fo:block linefeed-treatment="preserve"> <xsl:text> Page </xsl:text> <fo:page-number /> <xsl:text> of </xsl:text> <fo:page-number-citation ref-id="last-page" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> </fo:static-content> <fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body"> <xsl:apply-templates select="PrintJasper" /> <fo:block id="last-page" /> </fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </fo:root> </xsl:template> <!--Page Structure --> <xsl:template match="PrintJasper"> <fo:table border-width="0mm" table-layout="fixed" width="17cm"> <fo:table-column column-width="50%" /> <fo:table-column column-width="50%" /> <fo:table-body> <!--1st row --> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell padding="2mm"> <fo:block color="#8fbc8f" font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="28pt" /> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell padding="2mm"> <fo:block background-color="White" font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" text-align="right"> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo"> <fo:table table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" text-align="right"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine1" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine2!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" text-align="right"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine2" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine3!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine3" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine4!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine4" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine5!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine5" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine6!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@AddressLine6" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@City!='' or /PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@State!='' or /PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@ShortZipCode!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@City, ' ', /PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@State, ' ', /PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@ShortZipCode)" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@Country!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@Country" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@DayPhone!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@DayPhone" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@DayFaxNo!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@DayFaxNo" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/@PrimaryUrl!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:variable name="path" select="/PrintJasper/Organization/@PrimaryUrl" /> <fo:basic-link color="blue" external-destination="url({$path})" text-decoration="underline"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/@PrimaryUrl" /> </fo:basic-link> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@EMailID!=''"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell width="8cm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:variable name="path" select="concat('mailto:', /PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@EMailID)" /> <fo:basic-link color="blue" external-destination="url({$path})" text-decoration="underline"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/Organization/CorporatePersonInfo/@EMailID" /> </fo:basic-link> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row background-color="#8fbc8f" height="0.26in"> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" number-columns-spanned="2" padding="1mm" padding-top="1mm"> <fo:block color="white" font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="14pt" font-weight="bold" line-height="0.26in"> <xsl:text>Quote</xsl:text> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <!--Opening Comments --> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/UserInput/@OpeningComments!="" or /PrintJasper/UserInput/@Salutation!="" or /PrintJasper/Order/@CustomerLastName!="" or /PrintJasper/Order/@CustomerFirstName!="""> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="2" padding="2mm" width="8cm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" text-align="justify"> <xsl:apply-templates select="UserInput/@OpeningComments" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" number-columns-spanned="2" padding="2mm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" /> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="2" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Resource/Proposal/Address" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" number-columns-spanned="2" padding="2mm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" /> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" number-columns-spanned="2" padding="1mm" padding-top="0mm" width="10cm"> <fo:block background-color="White" font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader" /> </fo:block> <fo:block linefeed-treatment="preserve"> <xsl:text /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" number-columns-spanned="2" padding="2mm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" /> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <!--Order lines --> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="2" padding="1mm" padding-bottom="0mm" padding-top="0mm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" text-align="center"> <xsl:variable name="defaultOrderLineType" /> <xsl:variable name="lineCount" select="count(/PrintJasper/Order/OrderLines/OrderLine)" /> <xsl:variable name="orderLineCount" select="count(/PrintJasper/Order/OrderLines/OrderLine[@LineType=''])" /> <xsl:variable name="recommendedLineCount" select="count(/PrintJasper/Order/OrderLines/OrderLine[@LineType='Recommended'])" /> <xsl:if test="Resource/Proposal/OrderLines/@QuoteLines='Y' and $orderLineCount > 0"> <xsl:call-template name="orderLinesTemplate"> <xsl:with-param name="orderLineType" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" number-columns-spanned="2" padding="2mm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" /> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <!--Recommended lines --> <xsl:variable name="recommendedLineCount" select="count(/PrintJasper/Order/OrderLines/OrderLine[@LineType='Recommended'])" /> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/OrderLines/@RecommendedLines='Y' and ($recommendedLineCount > 0)"> <fo:table-row background-color="#8fbc8f"> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="2" padding-bottom="0mm" padding-left="5mm" padding-top="0mm"> <fo:block text-align="center"> <fo:block color="black" font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" text-align="left"> <xsl:text>Recommended</xsl:text> </fo:block> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="2" padding="1mm" padding-bottom="0mm" padding-top="0mm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" text-align="center"> <xsl:call-template name="orderLinesTemplate"> <xsl:with-param name="orderLineType">Recommended</xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" number-columns-spanned="2" padding="2mm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" /> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <!--3rd Row --> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" empty-cells="hide" padding="1mm"> <fo:block /> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" padding="1mm"> <fo:block background-color="White" font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" text-align="left"> <xsl:apply-templates select="Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <!--Closing Comments --> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/UserInput/@ClosingComments!="""> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="2"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" text-align="justify"> <xsl:apply-templates select="UserInput/@ClosingComments" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> <!--Complimentary Comments --> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/UserInput/@ComplimentaryClosing!="""> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="2"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" text-align="justify"> <xsl:apply-templates select="UserInput/@ComplimentaryClosing" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </xsl:template> <!--END --> <xsl:template match="Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader"> <fo:block> <!--starting inside table --> <fo:table border-width="0mm" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.25in" /> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@ProposalTitle = 'Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.25in" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@ProposalDate = 'Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.25in" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@DeliveryDate = 'Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.25in" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@ExpirationDate = 'Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.25in" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@Status = 'Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.25in" /> </xsl:if> <!--Table Header --> <fo:table-header font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="9pt" text-align="center"> <fo:table-row background-color="#CCCCCC" border-style="solid" border-width=".5pt"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm" starts-row="true"> <fo:block font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Customer ID </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@ProposalTitle = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Proposal Title </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@ProposalDate = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Proposal Date </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@DeliveryDate = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Delivery Date </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@ExpirationDate = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Expiration Date </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@Status = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Status </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-header> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row border-style="solid" border-width=".5pt"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="/PrintJasper/Order/@BillToID" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@ProposalTitle = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" text-align="left"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/UserInput/@ProposalTitle" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@ProposalDate = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm" text-align="left"> <fo:block> <xsl:if test="$proposalDate != ''"> <xsl:value-of select="formatDate($localeCode, $proposalDate)" /> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@DeliveryDate = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:if test="$reqDeliveryDate != ''"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="formatDate($localeCode, $reqDeliveryDate)" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@ExpirationDate = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:if test="$expirationDate != ''"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="formatDate($localeCode, $expirationDate)" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/ProposalHeader/@Status = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="/PrintJasper/Order/@Status" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> <fo:block linefeed-treatment="preserve"> <xsl:text /> </fo:block> <fo:block> <!--starting second table --> <fo:table border-width="0mm" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.25in" /> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@ShippngTerms = 'Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.25in" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@LevelOfService = 'Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.25in" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@InstructionText = 'Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="2.25in" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@PaymentTerms = 'Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.5in" /> </xsl:if> <!--Table Header --> <fo:table-header font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="9pt" text-align="center"> <fo:table-row background-color="#CCCCCC" border-style="solid" border-width=".5pt"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm" starts-row="true"> <fo:block font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Sales Person </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@ShippngTerms = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Carrier </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@LevelOfService = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Level of Service </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@InstructionText = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Shipping Instructions </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@PaymentTerms = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Payment Terms </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-header> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row border-style="solid" border-width=".5pt"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="/PrintJasper/Order/@EnteredBy" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@ShippngTerms = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm" text-align="left"> <fo:block> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="/PrintJasper/Order/@SCAC" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@LevelOfService = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="/PrintJasper/Order/@LevelOfService" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@InstructionText = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="/PrintJasper/Order/Instructions/Instruction/@InstructionText" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Terms/@PaymentTerms = 'Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-style="solid" border-width=".25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="/PrintJasper/Order/@TermsCode" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <!--Ending inside table --> </fo:block> </xsl:template> <!--Address --> <xsl:template match="Resource/Proposal/Address"> <!--starting inside table --> <fo:table border-color="black" border-width="0mm" font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" table-layout="fixed" width="100%"> <fo:table-column column-width="35%" /> <fo:table-column column-width="30%" /> <fo:table-column column-width="35%" /> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Address/@BillTo = "Y""> <fo:table-cell background-color="#CCCCCC" padding="1mm" starts-row="true"> <fo:block font-weight="bold"> <fo:inline vertical-align="bottom"> <xsl:text>Bill To</xsl:text> </fo:inline> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block /> </fo:table-cell> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Address/@ShipTo = "Y""> <fo:table-cell background-color="#CCCCCC" ends-row="true" padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-weight="bold"> <xsl:text>Ship To</xsl:text> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Address/@BillTo = "Y""> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="justify"> <xsl:call-template name="formatAddress"> <xsl:with-param name="addressElement" select="/PrintJasper/Order/PersonInfoBillTo" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <fo:table-cell empty-cells="hide"> <fo:block /> </fo:table-cell> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/Address/@ShipTo = "Y""> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="justify"> <xsl:call-template name="formatAddress"> <xsl:with-param name="addressElement" select="/PrintJasper/Order/PersonInfoShipTo" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <!--Ending inside table --> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="formatAddress"> <xsl:param name="addressElement" /> <fo:list-block> <fo:list-item> <fo:list-item-label> <fo:block /> </fo:list-item-label> <fo:list-item-body> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-weight="bold"> <xsl:value-of select="$addressElement/@Company" /> </fo:block> </fo:list-item-body> </fo:list-item> <fo:list-item> <fo:list-item-label> <fo:block /> </fo:list-item-label> <fo:list-item-body> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}"> <xsl:value-of select="concat($addressElement/@FirstName, ' ', $addressElement/@LastName)" /> </fo:block> </fo:list-item-body> </fo:list-item> <fo:list-item> <fo:list-item-label> <fo:block /> </fo:list-item-label> <fo:list-item-body> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}"> <xsl:value-of select="$addressElement/@AddressLine1" /> </fo:block> </fo:list-item-body> </fo:list-item> <fo:list-item> <fo:list-item-label> <fo:block /> </fo:list-item-label> <fo:list-item-body> <fo:block font-family="{$xslfontfamily}"> <xsl:value-of select="$addressElement/@AddressLine2" /> </fo:block> </fo:list-item-body> </fo:list-item> <fo:list-item> <fo:list-item-label> <fo:block /> </fo:list-item-label> <fo:list-item-body> <fo:block> <xsl:value-of select="concat($addressElement/@City, ' ',$addressElement/@State , ' ', $addressElement/@ZipCode)" /> </fo:block> </fo:list-item-body> </fo:list-item> <fo:list-item> <fo:list-item-label> <fo:block /> </fo:list-item-label> <fo:list-item-body> <fo:block> <xsl:value-of select="$addressElement/@Country" /> </fo:block> </fo:list-item-body> </fo:list-item> <fo:list-item> <fo:list-item-label> <fo:block /> </fo:list-item-label> <fo:list-item-body> <fo:block> <xsl:value-of select="$addressElement/@DayPhone" /> </fo:block> </fo:list-item-body> </fo:list-item> <fo:list-item> <fo:list-item-label> <fo:block /> </fo:list-item-label> <fo:list-item-body> <fo:block> <xsl:value-of select="$addressElement/@EMailID" /> </fo:block> </fo:list-item-body> </fo:list-item> </fo:list-block> </xsl:template> <!--Opening Comments Template --> <xsl:template match="UserInput/@OpeningComments"> <!--starting inside table --> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="100%"> <fo:table-column column-width="100%" /> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block linefeed-treatment="preserve"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/UserInput/@Salutation" /> <fo:inline font-weight="bold"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', /PrintJasper/Order/PersonInfoBillTo/@Title, ' ', /PrintJasper/Order/@CustomerFirstName,' ' ,/PrintJasper/Order/@CustomerLastName)" /> </fo:inline> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/UserInput/@OpeningComments != """> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block linefeed-treatment="preserve"> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/UserInput/@OpeningComments" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <!--Ending inside table --> </xsl:template> <!--OrderLines --> <xsl:template name="orderLinesTemplate"> <xsl:param name="orderLineType" select="''" /> <fo:table border-width="0mm" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width=".5in" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation/@Additional='Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="3.0in" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <fo:table-column column-width="3.85in" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <fo:table-column column-width="0.65in" /> <fo:table-column column-width="0.65in" /> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation/@Additional='Y'"> <fo:table-column column-width="0.85in" /> </xsl:if> <fo:table-column column-width="0.85in" /> <fo:table-column column-width="0.85in" /> <!--Table Header --> <fo:table-header background-color="White" font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="9pt" text-align="center"> <fo:table-row background-color="#CCCCCC" border-style="solid" border-width=".5pt"> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-weight="bold" text-align="center" /> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" hyphenate="true" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Item Description </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" hyphenate="true" hyphenation-character="-" hyphenation-keep="auto" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Quantity </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" hyphenate="true" hyphenation-character="-" hyphenation-keep="auto" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Unit Price </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation/@Additional='Y'"> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" hyphenate="true" hyphenation-character="-" hyphenation-keep="auto" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable">Upfront Charges</xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" hyphenate="true" hyphenation-character="-" hyphenation-keep="auto" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Adjustment </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block font-size="10pt" font-weight="bold" hyphenate="true" hyphenation-character="-" text-align="left"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Line Total </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-header> <!-- Including order lines --> <!--Table Body --> <fo:table-body background-color="White" font-family="{$xslfontfamily}" font-size="10pt"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="count(/PrintJasper/Order/OrderLines/OrderLine[@LineType=$orderLineType])=0"> <fo:table-row background-color="#ffffff" border-left-width="0pt" border-right-width="0pt" border-style="solid" border-width=".5pt"> <fo:table-cell border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-color="#000000" border-left-width="0pt" border-right-width="0pt" border-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25pt" number-columns-spanned="6" padding="1mm"> <fo:block linefeed-treatment="preserve"> <xsl:text>No records to Display</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="count(/PrintJasper/Order/OrderLines/OrderLine[@LineType='$orderLineType'])"/> <xsl:value-of select="$orderLineType"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="(/PrintJasper/UserInput/@IncludeMinorLines="Y") and (count(/PrintJasper/Order/OrderLines/OrderLine[@LineType=$orderLineType]) > 0)"> <xsl:for-each select="/PrintJasper/Order/OrderLines/OrderLine[@LineType=$orderLineType]"> <xsl:call-template name="paintOrderLine"> <xsl:with-param name="orderLineElement" select="." /> <xsl:with-param name="index" select="position()" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:for-each select="/PrintJasper/Order/OrderLines/OrderLine[@LineType=$orderLineType]"> <xsl:if test="(./@IsBundleParent='N' and not(normalize-space(./@BundleParentOrderLineKey))) or (./@IsBundleParent="Y")"> <xsl:call-template name="paintOrderLine"> <xsl:with-param name="orderLineElement" select="." /> <xsl:with-param name="index" select="position()" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="paintOrderLine"> <xsl:param name="orderLineElement" /> <xsl:param name="index" /> <fo:table-row background-color="#CCCCCC" border-style="solid" border-width=".5pt"> <xsl:attribute name="background-color"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="($index mod 2) = 0"> <xsl:text>#F3F3F3</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text>#FFFFFF</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:attribute> <fo:table-cell border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-color="#000000" border-left-width="0pt" border-right-width="0pt" border-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block> <xsl:variable name="path" select="concat($orderLineElement/ItemDetails/PrimaryInformation/@ImageLocation, '/', $orderLineElement/ItemDetails/PrimaryInformation/@ImageID)" /> <fo:external-graphic content-height="scale-to-fit" content-width="scale-to-fit" height="0.28in" src="url({$path})" width="0.41in" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-color="#000000" border-left-width="0pt" border-right-width="0pt" border-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <fo:list-block> <fo:list-item> <fo:list-item-label> <fo:block /> </fo:list-item-label> <fo:list-item-body> <fo:block hyphenate="true" hyphenation-character="-"> <xsl:variable name="ItemShortDesc"> <xsl:value-of select="concat($orderLineElement/ItemDetails/PrimaryInformation/@ShortDescription,' (', $orderLineElement/ItemDetails/@ItemID,')' )" /> </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$ItemShortDesc" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> <fo:block linefeed-treatment="preserve"> <xsl:text /> </fo:block> </fo:list-item-body> </fo:list-item> <fo:list-item> <fo:list-item-label> <fo:block /> </fo:list-item-label> <fo:list-item-body> <fo:block> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$orderLineElement/ItemDetails/PrimaryInformation/@Description" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:list-item-body> </fo:list-item> </fo:list-block> <xsl:if test="count($orderLineElement/ItemDetails/ItemAttributeGroupTypeList/ItemAttributeGroupType[@ItemAttributeGroupType = 'FOR_PRINT']/ItemAttributeGroupList/ItemAttributeGroup/ItemAttributeList/ItemAttribute)"> <fo:block linefeed-treatment="preserve"> <xsl:text /> </fo:block> <fo:table table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.65in" /> <fo:table-column column-width="0.15in" /> <fo:table-column column-width="1.65in" /> <fo:table-body> <xsl:for-each select="$orderLineElement/ItemDetails/ItemAttributeGroupTypeList/ItemAttributeGroupType[@ItemAttributeGroupType = 'FOR_PRINT']/ItemAttributeGroupList/ItemAttributeGroup/ItemAttributeList/ItemAttribute"> <fo:table-row height="0.17in"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-weight="bold" text-align="right"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="@ItemAttributeName" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell empty-cells="hide"> <fo:block> <xsl:text /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="@Value" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(4)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-color="#000000" border-left-width="0pt" border-right-width="0pt" border-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="left"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(formatNumber($localeCode, @OrderedQty) ,' ' ,$orderLineElement/ItemDetails/@UnitOfMeasure)" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-color="#000000" border-left-width="0pt" border-right-width="0pt" border-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="number($orderLineElement/ComputedPrice/@UnitPrice)"> <xsl:call-template name="formatCurrency"> <xsl:with-param name="amount" select="$orderLineElement/ComputedPrice/@UnitPrice" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$orderLineElement/ComputedPrice/@UnitPrice" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation/@Additional='Y'"> <fo:table-cell border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-color="#000000" border-left-width="0pt" border-right-width="0pt" border-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="number($orderLineElement/ComputedPrice/@AdditionalLinePriceTotal)"> <xsl:call-template name="formatCurrency"> <xsl:with-param name="amount" select="$orderLineElement/ComputedPrice/@AdditionalLinePriceTotal" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$orderLineElement/ComputedPrice/@AdditionalLinePriceTotal" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <fo:table-cell border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-color="#000000" border-left-width="0pt" border-right-width="0pt" border-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:call-template name="formatCurrency"> <xsl:with-param name="amount" select="$orderLineElement/ComputedPrice/@Discount" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-color="#000000" border-left-width="0pt" border-right-width="0pt" border-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25pt" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:call-template name="formatCurrency"> <xsl:with-param name="amount" select="$orderLineElement/ComputedPrice/@LineTotal" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:template> <!--PricingInformation --> <xsl:template match="Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation"> <xsl:variable name="rootVariable" select="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation" /> <!--starting inside table --> <xsl:if test="count(/PrintJasper/Order/OrderLines/OrderLine) and (/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/OrderLines/@QuoteLines="Y" or /PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/OrderLines/@RecommendedLines="Y")"> <xsl:if test="$rootVariable/@Discounts='Y' or $rootVariable/@GrandTotal='Y' or $rootVariable/@ShippingCharges='Y' or $rootVariable/@SubTotal='Y' or $rootVariable/@Taxes='Y'"> <fo:table table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="1.5in" /> <fo:table-column column-width="0.25in" /> <fo:table-column column-width="1.5in" /> <fo:table-body> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation/@SubTotal='Y'"> <xsl:call-template name="createPricingLine"> <xsl:with-param name="headerName"> <xsl:text>Line Sub Total</xsl:text> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="paramValue" select="/PrintJasper/Order/OverallTotals/@SubtotalWithoutTaxes" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation/@Discounts='Y'"> <xsl:call-template name="createPricingLine"> <xsl:with-param name="headerName"> <xsl:text>Header Adjustments</xsl:text> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="paramValue" select="/PrintJasper/Order/OverallTotals/@HeaderAdjustmentWithoutShipping" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation/@ShippingCharges='Y'"> <xsl:call-template name="createPricingLine"> <xsl:with-param name="headerName"> <xsl:text>Shipping Charges</xsl:text> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="paramValue" select="/PrintJasper/Order/OverallTotals/@HdrShippingCharges" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation/@Taxes='Y'"> <xsl:call-template name="createPricingLine"> <xsl:with-param name="headerName"> <xsl:text>Taxes</xsl:text> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="paramValue" select="/PrintJasper/Order/OverallTotals/@GrandTax" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/PrintJasper/Resource/Proposal/PricingInformation/@GrandTotal='Y'"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" font-weight="bold" padding="1mm" starts-row="true"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:variable name="variable"> Order Total </xsl:variable> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$variable" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell empty-cells="hide"> <fo:block /> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell border-top-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25mm" ends-row="true" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:call-template name="formatCurrency"> <xsl:with-param name="amount" select="/PrintJasper/Order/OverallTotals/@GrandTotal" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <!--Ending inside table --> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="createPricingLine"> <xsl:param name="headerName" /> <xsl:param name="paramValue" /> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" font-weight="bold" padding="1mm" starts-row="true"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="$headerName" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="number(6)" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell empty-cells="hide"> <fo:block /> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell border-width="0mm" ends-row="true" padding="1mm"> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xsl:call-template name="formatCurrency"> <xsl:with-param name="amount" select="$paramValue" /> </xsl:call-template> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:template> <!--Closing Comments Template --> <xsl:template match="UserInput/@ClosingComments"> <!--starting inside table --> <fo:table table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="100%" /> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/UserInput/@ClosingComments" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <!--Ending inside table --> </xsl:template> <!--Complimentary Comments Template --> <xsl:template match="UserInput/@ComplimentaryClosing"> <!--starting inside table --> <fo:table table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="100%" /> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell padding="1mm"> <fo:block> <xsl:value-of select="/PrintJasper/UserInput/@ComplimentaryClosing" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <!--Ending inside table --> <xsl:variable name="newline"> <xsl:text /> </xsl:variable> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="split_value"> <xsl:param name="value" /> <xsl:param name="max_length" /> <xsl:variable name="ret"> <xsl:if test="string-length($value) <= $max_length"> <xsl:value-of select="$value" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length($value) > $max_length"> <xsl:value-of select="substring($value, 1, $max_length)" /> <xsl:value-of select="'​'" /> <xsl:call-template name="split_value"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="substring($value, $max_length + 1)" /> <xsl:with-param name="max_length" select="$max_length" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="$ret" /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="formatNumber"> <xsl:param name="value" /> <xsl:param name="separatorEvery" select="string('3')" /> <xsl:variable name="ret"> <xsl:if test="string-length($value) > $separatorEvery"> <xsl:call-template name="formatNumber"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="substring($value, 1, string-length($value) - $separatorEvery)" /> <xsl:with-param name="separatorEvery" select="$separatorEvery" /> </xsl:call-template> <xsl:value-of select="','" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="substring($value, string-length($value) -$separatorEvery + 1, $separatorEvery)" /> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="$ret" /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="formatCurrency"> <xsl:param name="amount" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="starts-with($amount, '-')"> <xsl:text>-</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="$pricePrefix" /> <xsl:call-template name="formatNumber"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="substring-before(substring-after($amount,'-'),'.')" /> </xsl:call-template> <xsl:text>.</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after($amount,'.')" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$pricePrefix" /> <xsl:call-template name="formatNumber"> <xsl:with-param name="value" select="substring-before($amount,'.')" /> </xsl:call-template> <xsl:text>.</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after($amount,'.')" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
